Recommendations: Researches on student needs, employability and demand analysis of graduates, and effectiveness of the implementation of student activities are encouraged.
A more active alumni association is imperative hence, shall be strengthened.
For a more responsive guidance services, accredited/licensed guidance counselors can be hired to better service the students.
Budget for student development can be reviewed to allow greater flexibility in rendering student services and in conducting student activities
Linkages with industries, government and private entities shall be strengthened in order.to identify more employment opportunities for graduates.
Since results and feedbacks will be the bases for improved student services, regular monitoring and evaluation of activities shall be continuously conducted.
Enrolment campaigns are encouraged to increase enrolment.
